body.name: Convenience Kits International Men’s Premium 20-Piece Kit with Travel Size TSA Compliant Essentials, Featuring: Dove Men & Care Products in Brown Dopp Bag

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Convenience Kits International Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 11 hrs 42 mins
features: TSA APPROVED TRAVEL ACCESSORIES: This TSA compliant 20-piece travel necessities kit contains essential travel size toiletries and travel accessories for men

TRAVEL SIZE TOILETRIES: A great gift set for men, this travel kit includes popular national brand grooming and oral care travel size essentials from brands including Barbasol, Gillette Good News, Dove for Men, Gold Bond, Crest, Colgate, Advil and Curad

MEN'S PREMIUM TRAVEL KIT: This men's travel kit is ideal for holiday and birthday gift giving, Father’s Day, stocking stuffers, business travelers, carry-on airline travel, weather-related emergencies, gym kits, busy college students and weekend getaways, and is a great add-on for any trip
TRAVEL SIZE: The attractive, TSA compliant quart-size zip top brown travel bag with handle measures 8.5” L x 3” W x 5” H for easy packing and travel

TRAVEL ESSENTIALS: This 20-piece travel kit contains the following travel size toiletries and travel accessories: Barbasol Shave Cream, Gillette Good News Disposable Razor, Dove for Men 2 in 1 Shampoo + Conditioner, Dove for Men Antiperspirant Deodorant, Gold Bond Powder, lip balm (assorted flavors), comb, Crest Toothpaste, Colgate Adult Soft Toothbrush, toothbrush cap, Colgate Total Mouthwash, Dentek Dental Flossers, Advil Caplets, Curad Finger Strip Bandages, toe nail clipper with file and vanity pack (cotton swabs, cotton balls, and cotton rounds)
Gillette Good News Disposable Razor - (package may vary) , Crest Toothpaste 0.85 oz. (package may vary), Men 2 in 1 Shampoo + Conditioner 3 oz. (shape/ package may vary)
body.description: 20 Piece Kit Contains: Hair/Scalp Care: Dove Men & Care 2 in 1 Shampoo + Conditioner Fresh & Clean 3 oz. Face Care: Gillette Good News 2 Blade Disposable Razor (package may vary), Fresh Scent Shave Gel with Menthol .85 oz., Lip Balm with Vitamin E, Body Care: Dove Men & Care A/P Deodorant Clean Comfort 0.5 oz., Dude Body Powder Fragrance Free with Vitamin E and Aloe 1.5 oz., Black Pocket Comb, Oral Care: Crest Toothpaste 0.85 oz. (package may vary), Full Size Toothbrush, Toothbrush Cap, Crest ProHealth Mouthwash 1.2 oz., Dentek ADA accepted Floss Picks 3 ct., Travel Essentials: Motrin 2 ct., 3-Adhesive Bandages, Toe Nail Clipper with file, Vanity Pack ( 20 swabs/6 cotton balls/6 cotton rounds.),TSA Compliant Quart Size Zip-Top Bag packed in Brown zippered Dopp Toiletry Bag with Handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a super reasonable kit with all the essentials needed. Very cheap considering what you would find in stores and everything is compact and comes together. I was very pleased with this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has everything ready to go!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased three of these for my sons to use on our cruise and I couldn’t have been more satisfied. The bag itself was nice, it wasn’t anything extravagant but in my opinion that was a bonus, no stressing over it getting damaged in their luggage or getting accidentally left behind after we departed and the products included were good quality and exactly as advertised. It saved me so much time and worry and at a great price. The only thing I needed to add was a bar of soap and it was ready to go! One of the bags arrived with some of the powder spilled out but it was very little and it was easy enough to just wipe it off the other containers . I would purchase this same kit again if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I would give it five stars but when I got the kit the baby powder that came with it had went everywhere in the pouch. The top was broken so I had to throw it out and clean everything in the pouch. Either than the baby powder mishap, it is a cute little kit with a good amount of equipment for a good price! It also came right on time to put in as stocking stuffers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was perfect for travel.
reviews.reviewText: It was perfect. It came with everything a man would want or could want for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value, Great Product Mix
reviews.reviewText: Shipping was timely,, very good value for the dollar, great product mix !!! A++

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality control
reviews.reviewText: Powder leaks. Had to wash the bag out after it showed up. No tooth brush in bag.
